summary: This is an email chain from December 10, 2008, discussing a letter regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release. The participants are coordinating comments and hand-delivery of the letter.

events.title: Discussion of Epstein Work Release Letter
events.description: Email correspondence regarding a letter about Jeffrey Epstein's work release, indicating someone is ready to hand-deliver it.

keyFacts: A letter regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release was being discussed in December 2008.
The correspondence indicates the letter was ready to be hand-delivered.
The email participants are not named, only referred to as 'guys' and with initials/redactions.
The document shows coordination among individuals regarding Epstein's legal situation post-conviction.
